    public abstract class TextEdgeInputFormat<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,​E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends org.apache.giraph.io.EdgeInputFormat<I,​E>
    Abstract class that users should subclass to use their own text based edge output format.
